tabs.readingDesc: Discover the hidden meanings in your dreams
tabs.aboutDesc: Learn about dream interpretation and symbolism

intro.title: What did you dream?
intro.text: Share your dream and discover its hidden meanings through ancient wisdom and modern psychology. Our AI combines Eastern dream interpretation with Western symbolism for deep insights.

about.whatIsText: Dream interpretation is the process of discovering hidden meanings in dreams. Throughout history, cultures worldwide have believed dreams carry messages from the subconscious mind or spiritual realms.
about.easternText: In Korean and Chinese traditions, dreams are seen as omens and messages. Certain symbols like dragons, water, or ancestors carry specific meanings related to fortune, relationships, and life paths.
about.psychologyText: Modern psychology views dreams as windows to the unconscious mind. Carl Jung believed dreams reveal archetypes and shadow aspects of our psyche, helping us understand ourselves more deeply.
about.symbolsText: Flying often represents freedom and ambition. Water reflects emotions and the unconscious. Teeth falling out may indicate anxiety about appearance or communication. Each symbol gains meaning from your personal context.
